;rooms: 2 bytes each. byte 0 is the colour, byte 1 is the room type. ends with Ch (the last room - the falling screen). room number is implicit in order, i.e. 0,1,2
0x042,0x000,0x043,0x002,0x044,0x003,0x045,0x002,0x046,0x004,0x047,0x002,0x046,0x003,0x045,0x002,0x044,0x004,0x043,0x000,0x042,0x003,0x043,0x003,0x044,0x003,0x045,0x000,0x046,0x004,0x047,0x004,0x046,0x004,0x045,0x004,0x044,0x004,0x043,0x000,0x042,0x003,0x043,0x003,0x044,0x003,0x045,0x000,0x046,0x004,0x047,0x003,0x046,0x005,0x045,0x000,0x044,0x008,0x043,0x001,0x042,0x004,0x043,0x002,0x044,0x003,0x045,0x002,0x046,0x004,0x047,0x002,0x046,0x003,0x045,0x002,0x044,0x005,0x043,0x000,0x042,0x004,0x043,0x000,0x044,0x003,0x045,0x000,0x046,0x004,0x047,0x000,0x046,0x003,0x045,0x005,0x044,0x001,0x043,0x00A,0x042,0x00A,0x043,0x001,0x044,0x00A,0x045,0x001,0x046,0x009,0x047,0x009,0x046,0x001,0x045,0x001,0x044,0x001,0x043,0x001,0x042,0x001,0x043,0x001,0x044,0x001,0x045,0x009,0x046,0x001,0x047,0x001,0x046,0x00A,0x045,0x001,0x044,0x009,0x043,0x001,0x042,0x001,0x043,0x009,0x045,0x001,0x045,0x00A,0x046,0x009,0x047,0x001,0x046,0x001,0x045,0x00A,0x044,0x001,0x043,0x009,0x042,0x001,0x043,0x00A,0x044,0x009,0x045,0x001,0x046,0x001,0x047,0x001,0x046,0x000,0x045,0x000,0x044,0x000,0x043,0x000,0x042,0x000,0x047,0x000,0x043,0x000,0x044,0x000,0x045,0x000,0x046,0x000,0x047,0x000,0x046,0x000,0x045,0x000,0x044,0x000,0x043,0x000,0x042,0x000,0x043,0x000,0x044,0x000,0x045,0x000,0x046,0x000,0x047,0x000,0x046,0x000,0x045,0x000,0x044,0x000,0x043,0x000,0x042,0x004,0x043,0x000,0x044,0x005,0x045,0x005,0x046,0x003,0x047,0x001,0x046,0x000,0x045,0x000,0x044,0x003,0x043,0x000,0x042,0x004,0x043,0x000,0x044,0x003,0x045,0x000,0x046,0x004,0x047,0x000,0x046,0x000,0x045,0x000,0x044,0x000,0x043,0x000,0x042,0x000,0x043,0x000,0x044,0x000,0x045,0x000,0x046,0x000,0x047,0x000,0x046,0x000,0x045,0x000,0x044,0x004,0x043,0x004,0x042,0x004,0x047,0x00B,0x043,0x001,0x044,0x001,0x045,0x001,0x046,0x001,0x047,0x001,0x046,0x001,0x000,0x000,0x000,0x00C
;objects: 6 bytes each: block type (see block data below), room number, x, y, flags, door time, doorflag - some are unknown
; flags: rotation (0=top, 60=right, 80=bottom, eo=left), other values: 3 if open trapdoor or rug, 4 if its a table, 41h if picture; these are if room links: 1 if clock, 61h if clock or picture, 81h if clock, picture, antler trophy, trophy, skeleton; e1 for clock, picture, barrel, skeleton
; door timing: 0 if no door, otherwise a number to represent the time it opens/shuts presumably
0x002,0x007,0x050,0x01F,0x000,0x004,0x056,0x002,0x000,0x050,0x0B7,0x080,0x004,0x006,0x002,0x019,0x0A0,0x06F,0x060,0x0B7,0x003,0x002,0x000,0x008,0x06F,0x0E0,0x006,0x003,0x00A,0x001,0x050,0x0B7,0x080,0x004,0x006,0x00A,0x000,0x050,0x01F,0x000,0x004,0x056,0x002,0x002,0x0A0,0x06F,0x060,0x0B7,0x003,0x002,0x001,0x008,0x06F,0x0E0,0x006,0x003,0x002,0x003,0x0A0,0x06F,0x060,0x0B7,0x003,0x002,0x002,0x008,0x06F,0x0E0,0x006,0x003,0x002,0x004,0x050,0x01F,0x000,0x004,0x056,0x002,0x003,0x050,0x0B7,0x080,0x004,0x006,0x002,0x019,0x008,0x06F,0x0E0,0x006,0x003,0x002,0x004,0x080,0x06F,0x060,0x0B7,0x003,0x002,0x005,0x050,0x01F,0x000,0x004,0x056,0x002,0x004,0x050,0x0B7,0x080,0x004,0x006,0x002,0x006,0x008,0x06F,0x0E0,0x006,0x003,0x002,0x005,0x0A0,0x06F,0x060,0x0B7,0x003,0x003,0x01A,0x048,0x0B6,0x080,0x016,0x008,0x002,0x006,0x050,0x03F,0x000,0x004,0x056,0x009,0x008,0x050,0x01F,0x000,0x004,0x056,0x009,0x006,0x050,0x097,0x080,0x004,0x006,0x002,0x007,0x008,0x06F,0x0E0,0x006,0x003,0x002,0x006,0x0A0,0x06F,0x060,0x0B7,0x003,0x002,0x009,0x050,0x01F,0x000,0x004,0x057,0x002,0x008,0x050,0x0B7,0x080,0x004,0x006,0x002,0x00A,0x0A0,0x06F,0x060,0x0B7,0x003,0x002,0x009,0x008,0x06F,0x0E0,0x006,0x003,0x002,0x00B,0x0A0,0x06F,0x060,0x0B7,0x003,0x002,0x00A,0x008,0x06F,0x0E0,0x006,0x003,0x002,0x00C,0x0A0,0x06F,0x060,0x0B7,0x003,0x002,0x00B,0x008,0x06F,0x0E0,0x006,0x003,0x002,0x00D,0x0A0,0x06F,0x060,0x0B7,0x003,0x002,0x00C,0x008,0x06F,0x0E0,0x006,0x003,0x002,0x00E,0x050,0x0B7,0x080,0x004,0x006,0x002,0x00D,0x050,0x01F,0x000,0x004,0x056,0x002,0x00F,0x050,0x0B7,0x080,0x004,0x006,0x002,0x00E,0x050,0x01F,0x000,0x004,0x056,0x002,0x010,0x050,0x0B7,0x080,0x004,0x006,0x002,0x00F,0x050,0x01F,0x000,0x004,0x056,0x008,0x011,0x050,0x0B7,0x080,0x004,0x006,0x008,0x010,0x050,0x01F,0x000,0x004,0x056,0x002,0x012,0x050,0x0B7,0x080,0x004,0x006,0x002,0x011,0x050,0x01F,0x000,0x004,0x056,0x002,0x013,0x050,0x0B7,0x080,0x004,0x006,0x002,0x012,0x050,0x01F,0x000,0x004,0x056,0x002,0x014,0x008,0x06F,0x0E0,0x006,0x003,0x002,0x013,0x0A0,0x06F,0x 25,0x056,0x058,0x038,hunchback,aa_hunchback.gif,8,killed by frog leg
- END OF OBJECT DATA
Row 2 is the rooms
Row 6 is the object data for each address
Row 7 is the start room
Background data is stuff that is in a room, like doors, etc
Object data is that which is placed in rooms, e.g. food, etc
